Articles.Content:
I got a crash again, but it's different... This time, it happens at the menu, right as the menu music starts playing, and the screen is loading, the game crashes.

Got the Output log here: https://pastebin.com/raw/0mMzj4HZ

I'll put in the title and tags that this is a dead post when solved.

15 hours ago, Astromoo2 said:

Got the Output log here: https://pastebin.com/raw/0mMzj4HZ

That seems to be only a small part of the log, it ends before even mentioning the mods you are using.

But lookin at the filenames: you know you are running version 1.3.0 and not 1.2.2 like the folder name suggests? And you also know that mods or specifically plugins made for 1.3.1 are not backwards compatible with 1.3.0?

On 2/8/2018 at 2:41 AM, Harry Rhodan said:

That seems to be only a small part of the log, it ends before even mentioning the mods you are using.

But lookin at the filenames: you know you are running version 1.3.0 and not 1.2.2 like the folder name suggests? And you also know that mods or specifically plugins made for 1.3.1 are not backwards compatible with 1.3.0?

I am using 1.3.1, strangely, as the current version number and latest version number match, they're both 1804!

The problem is that 1.3.1 has the build number 1891.

1804 is 1.3.0, which is the version the fragment of the log you uploaded says you are using.
